Posts.Content: lifey wrote: Do you have a feeling that every show, movie, or news report has somebody dying of cancer? I am trying to have a positive outlook but it's hard when you're bombarded with negativity. My husband tends to change the channel, but I am curious-how do you deal with it (if you're at all bother by it). Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: cancer in the media lifey GeorgiaRai
